snippet.title: Dreamfall Chapters - Launch Trailer [UK]
snippet.description:
The fate of Worlds falls on you now! Follow the story of Zoë & Kian in the sequel of the award-winning The Longest Journey saga. Out now on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One!

Order now:
UK: 
PS4: https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B01NCSF13A
Xbox One: https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B01N6N5ZP2
Italy:
PS4: https://www.amazon.it/dp/B01MYX68WM
Xbox One: https://www.amazon.it/dp/B01N7FN1G6
